parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit(s) to watch the given position or target (without radio messages). Use [[objNull]] as the target to order a unit to stop watching a position/target.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit(s) '''doWatch''' position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit(s): [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit(s) '''doWatch''' target

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit(s): [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne '''doWatch''' [[markerPos]] "MarkerMoveOne"</code>

The unit named "soldierOne" will watch the position where the marker "MarkerMoveOne" is placed.

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne '''doWatch''' _eastSoldier</code>

The unit named "soldierOne" will watch the unit named "eastSoldier".

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[commandWatch]], [[lookAt]], [[glanceAt]]
</value></part></template>
